name: Insomnia (itch) (Vague14)
description:
You are trying to FALL asleep, but there are distractions all over your apartment stopping you. Go around and turn everything off, then get a peaceful night's sleep. This game is about FALLING asleep, which is how it fits the theme. Have fun! (Sorry about the low quality, I'm extremely new to Unity).

Controls:

movement: wasd

jump: space

sprint: shift

turn off distraction: just walk up to it

Hope you enjoy!
